Room.Name: Hafnia Mountain Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are hiking near a narrow creek, flowing alongside the road.
Room.LongDescription: the road is snow covered, and the creek is almost completely iced over. the mountains rising higher and higer in the east are hidden in dark clouds, promising more snow. A stiff breeze comes from the east, making you shiver. Across the creek, in a wooded clearing, you see a hut.
